summary: A 1930s British summer Bank Holiday starts at midday on Saturday with a rush for the trains to the sea-side. Doreen Richards under the name Miss Fulham is off with friend Milly to a beauty ... See full summary Â»
cast: John Lodge|Margaret Lockwood|Hugh Williams|Rene Ray|Merle Tottenham|Linden Travers|Wally Patch|Kathleen Harrison|Garry Marsh|Jeanne Stuart|Wilfrid Lawson|Felix Aylmer|David Anthony|Angela Glynne|Alf Goddard|Mike Johnson|Arthur West Payne|Michael Rennie|Charles Rolfe|Ernest Sefton|Leonard Sharp|Harry Terry|Ben Williams
title: El amor manda
